video.title: The 100
video.synopsis: A century after Earth was devastated by a nuclear apocalypse, 100 space station residents are sent to the planet to determine whether it's habitable.

episodes.synopsis: One hundred young exiles from a dying space station are sent to Earth 97 years after a nuclear apocalypse to test if the planet is now inhabitable.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Having discovered that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia, Finn and Monty set out on a mission to locate their friend.
episodes.title: Earth Skills

episodes.synopsis: Clarke, Bellamy, Octavia, Finn and Monty set out to locate Jasper, who may still be alive. Meanwhile, Abby is determined to get to Earth.
episodes.title: Earth Kills

episodes.synopsis: After a shocking death, Clarke and Finn grow closer. Bellamy must keep the group from turning on one another and Abby takes a huge risk.
episodes.title: Murphy's Law

episodes.synopsis: After exposing Kane’s plan to reduce the population of the Ark, Abby and Jaha realize at least some of the 100 must still be alive.
episodes.title: Twilight's Last Gleaming

episodes.synopsis: Bellamy and his crew run into Grounder territory as they search for Octavia while Raven notices the deep connection between Finn and Clarke.
episodes.title: His Sister's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Abby guides Clarke through a dangerous procedure while Diana Sydney takes her place as Chancellor. Kane agonizes over his recent decision.
episodes.title: Contents Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Some of the 100 lose touch with reality after eating a hallucinogen. One of them is tasked to kill and Diane Sydney's treachery is revealed.
episodes.title: Day Trip

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn attempt to broker peace with the Grounders while others prepare for battle. Meanwhile, tragedy strikes the Unity Day celebration.
episodes.title: Unity Day

episodes.synopsis: John Murphy returns claiming to have been held captive by the Grounders and Clarke and Bellamy have different ideas on how to handle his return.
episodes.title: I Am Become Death

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn lead a hunt for food, Raven makes Bellamy an offer he can’t refuse, and Kane risks his life and reunites with Jaha and Abby.
episodes.title: The Calm

episodes.synopsis: Clarke and Finn are confronted by a new enemy, Bellamy makes a heroic move to save Jasper, while those on the Ark face the inevitable.
episodes.title: We Are Grounders: Part I

episodes.synopsis: As the conflict escalates, Clarke pleads with Bellamy to do the right thing. Octavia makes a difficult choice. Raven and Jasper work against time.
episodes.title: We Are Grounders: Part II
